verbose_text: Previous studies have shown that the heat shock response can cause the dissociation of the IkappaB kinase (IKK) complex which is the major activator of the NF - kappaB complex, then inhibits the activation of the NF-kB signaling pathway [XREF_BIBR], and inhibits innate immunity or cellular responses in order to help cells to survive tissue injury [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: heat shock response can cause the dissociation of the IkappaB kinase
